Bash(python -c "
try:
    from src.mcp_server.server import mcp_server
    print\(''MCP Server imported successfully''\)
    print\(''Available tools:'', list\(mcp_server.tools.keys\(\)\)\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(''Error importing MCP server:'', e\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)

try:
    # Import tools to register them
    from src.mcp_server.tools import add_task, list_tasks, complete_task, update_task, delete_task
    print\(''Tools imported successfully''\)
    print\(''Available tools after import:'', list\(mcp_server.tools.keys\(\)\)\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(''Error importing tools:'', e\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
try:
    from src.mcp_server.server import mcp_server
    print\(''MCP Server imported successfully''\)
    print\(''Available tools initially:'', list\(mcp_server.tools.keys\(\)\)\)
    
    # Import one tool at a time to isolate the issue
    print\(''Importing add_task...''\)
    from src.mcp_server.tools.add_task import add_task
    print\(''add_task imported successfully''\)
    print\(''Available tools after add_task:'', list\(mcp_server.tools.keys\(\)\)\)
    
    print\(''Importing list_tasks...''\)
    from src.mcp_server.tools.list_tasks import list_tasks
    print\(''list_tasks imported successfully''\)
    print\(''Available tools after list_tasks:'', list\(mcp_server.tools.keys\(\)\)\)
    
    print\(''Importing complete_task...''\)
    from src.mcp_server.tools.complete_task import complete_task
    print\(''complete_task imported successfully''\)
    print\(''Available tools after complete_task:'', list\(mcp_server.tools.keys\(\)\)\)
    
    print\(''All tools imported successfully!''\)
    print\(''Final available tools:'', list\(mcp_server.tools.keys\(\)\)\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(''Error during import:'', e\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)
")
